casebody.data:
HAMBY
v.
PROFILE PRODUCTS, et al. No. 507A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 22, 2007. Joseph W. Moss, Charlotte, Burley B. Mitchell, Jr., Sarah L. Buthe, Raleigh, for Profile Products. G. Christopher Olson, Raleigh, for Hamby. Gregory C. York, Charlotte, for Electric Service Group, Inc. William G. Scoggin, Raleigh, H. Bryan Ives, III, Charlotte, for NCCBI and NCAI. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of January 2007 by NCCBI & NCAI for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief: "Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 22nd day of January 2007." Justice HUDSON recused.
